changes.title: UI Customization Props
changes.description: Added :ui, :mobileHeaderUI, and :optionalNoticeUI props for complete styling control with 50+ customizable keys following BEM naming convention.

changes.title: TypeScript Interfaces
changes.description: Exported StepperUI, MobileHeaderUI, and OptionalNoticeUI interfaces for type-safe customization.

changes.title: Component Renaming
changes.description: Renamed MultiStepStepper to Stepper and MultiStepMobileHeader to StepperMobileHeader for simpler imports.

changes.title: Backward Compatibility
changes.description: Legacy component names (MultiStepStepper, MultiStepMobileHeader) are still exported as aliases.

changes.title: Documentation Site
changes.description: Added comprehensive documentation at vue-stepper.doderasoft.com with live demo, API reference, and UI customization guide.

changes.title: SEO & AI Discoverability
changes.description: Added structured metadata, sitemap, robots.txt, and llms.txt for better search engine and AI assistant discoverability.

changes.title: Stepper Component
changes.description: Full-featured multi-step wizard component with sidebar navigation, step progression, and validation support.

changes.title: Mobile Responsive
changes.description: Built-in mobile header with dropdown navigation that automatically activates on smaller screens.

changes.title: Optional Steps
changes.description: Support for marking steps as optional with visual indicators and skip functionality.

changes.title: Step Locking
changes.description: Ability to disable specific steps and control navigation flow with canGoNext prop.

changes.title: useMultiStep Composable
changes.description: Extracted composable for building custom stepper UIs with full control over step logic.

changes.title: TypeScript Support
changes.description: Full TypeScript support with exported types for StepConfig and StepChangeEvent.

changes.title: Slot-based Content
changes.description: Flexible slot system with default, header, and title slots for custom content injection.
